wrap up.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: Make sure you wrap up warm – it’s freezing.
She was wrapped up in a thick winter coat.
wrap up.translation[0].definitions[1].de: to finish a job, meeting etc
wrap up.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: We’re hoping to wrap up the negotiations this week.
wrap up.translation[0].definitions[2].de: to give so much of your attention to something that you do not have time for anything else
wrap up.translation[1].definitions[0].de: a short report that repeats the main points, for example of a news broadcast
